title: Big Hole National Battlefield: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations         The Big Hole is an immense high mountain valley and this park and its story is just a small part of what the Big Hole is all about. While the tragic events of August 9 &10, 1877 is why Big Hole National Battlefield is preserved and a part of the National Park System, there is so much more that goes on here. Check out these short YouTube videos to learn more about nature at the park. Learn about the endemic Lemhi penstemon at Big Hole National Battlefield, and its relationship with a wasp specialized in collecting pollen from this plant.
